question.text:
Match the column and select the correct option from following.
 
  Column I   Column II
A Completely condensed chromosome i Prophase
(B) Division of centriole ii Metaphase
(C) Nuclear membrane, Golgibody, ER disappear. iii S-phase
(D) Splitting of centromere iv Anaphase II

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-iii</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-iv</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-iii</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v,</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>-iv</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text: During cell cycle centriole duplicates during S Phase , condensation of chromosome starts during prophase and condensation is completed during metaphase. Nuclear membrane, golgi body and ER disappears during late prophase. Centraomere splits are chromatids are separated during anaphase of mitosis and anaphase II of meiosis.
